duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee and provide customer service leadership, training, and coaching, for all store employees.
Maintain high retention by focusing on identifying qualified applicants, developing leaders, empowering employees, and encouraging employee productivity.
Oversee and implement all merchandising and marketing programs.
Use P&L and store reports to affect change.
Manage cash handling, fuel transactions, and promotion of loyalty program.
Maintain a clean, safe environment by complying with health and sanitation procedures to ensure the store is presentable and all products are in-stock.
Utilize Microsoft Office products for day-to-day operations.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or GED preferred, but not required for candidates with at least one year of retail management experience.
Valid Driver’s License from the state of residence with automotive liability insurance during employment.
